35 /* Authors: Robert Haschke
36  Desc: Project-agnostic utility classes
37 */
38 
39 #pragma once
40 
41 #include <type_traits>
42 #include <initializer_list>
43 
45 template <typename Enum>
46 class Flags
47 {
48  static_assert((sizeof(Enum) <= sizeof(int)), "Flags uses an int as storage, this enum will overflow!");
49 
50 public:
51  using Int = typename std::conditional<std::is_unsigned<Enum>::value, unsigned int, int>::type;
52  using enum_type = Enum;
53  // compiler-generated copy/move ctor/assignment operators are fine!
54 
55  // zero flags
56  constexpr inline Flags() noexcept : i(Int(0)) {}
57  // initialization from single enum
58  constexpr inline Flags(Enum f) noexcept : i(Int(f)) {}
59  // initialization from initializer_list
60  constexpr inline Flags(std::initializer_list<Enum> flags) noexcept
61  : i(initializer_list_helper(flags.begin(), flags.end())) {}
62 
63  const inline Flags& operator&=(int mask) noexcept {
64  i &= mask;
65  return *this;
66  }
67  const inline Flags& operator&=(unsigned int mask) noexcept {
68  i &= mask;
69  return *this;
70  }
71  const inline Flags& operator&=(Enum mask) noexcept {
72  i &= Int(mask);
73  return *this;
74  }
75  const inline Flags& operator|=(Flags f) noexcept {
76  i |= f.i;
77  return *this;
78  }
79  const inline Flags& operator|=(Enum f) noexcept {
80  i |= Int(f);
81  return *this;
82  }
83  const inline Flags& operator^=(Flags f) noexcept {
84  i ^= f.i;
85  return *this;
86  }
87  const inline Flags& operator^=(Enum f) noexcept {
88  i ^= Int(f);
89  return *this;
90  }
91 
92  constexpr inline operator Int() const noexcept { return i; }
93 
94  constexpr inline Flags operator|(Flags f) const noexcept { return Flags(i | f.i); }
95  constexpr inline Flags operator|(Enum f) const noexcept { return Flags(i | Int(f)); }
96  constexpr inline Flags operator^(Flags f) const noexcept { return Flags(i ^ f.i); }
97  constexpr inline Flags operator^(Enum f) const noexcept { return Flags(i ^ Int(f)); }
98  constexpr inline Flags operator&(int mask) const noexcept { return Flags(i & mask); }
99  constexpr inline Flags operator&(unsigned int mask) const noexcept { return Flags(i & mask); }
100  constexpr inline Flags operator&(Enum f) const noexcept { return Flags(i & Int(f)); }
101  constexpr inline Flags operator~() const noexcept { return Flags(~i); }
102 
103  constexpr inline bool operator!() const noexcept { return !i; }
104 
105  constexpr inline bool testFlag(Enum f) const noexcept {
106  return (i & Int(f)) == Int(f) && (Int(f) != 0 || i == Int(f));
107  }
108 
109 private:
110  constexpr inline Flags(Int i) : i(i) {}
111  constexpr static inline Int
112  initializer_list_helper(typename std::initializer_list<Enum>::const_iterator it,
113  typename std::initializer_list<Enum>::const_iterator end) noexcept {
114  return (it == end ? Int(0) : (Int(*it) | initializer_list_helper(it + 1, end)));
115  }
116 
117  Int i;
118 };
119 
120 #define DECLARE_FLAGS(Flags, Enum) typedef QFlags<Enum> Flags;

value
